title: 2 of Earth's rarest lightning phenomena captured simultaneously in once-in-a-lifetime photo
description: A photographer in Italy captured an ultra-rare elve and red sprite flashing above the Alps in a single breathtaking moment.
content: A photographer in Italy captured an ultra-rare elve and red sprite flashing above the Alps in a single breathtaking moment.
